name: The Bug Diaries
overview: An animated comedy series that follows a comic trio of slimy, crawly, and buzzy bug friends whose tiny world offers up huge adventures.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Three unlikely bug buddies, Fly, Spider and Worm, fly, spin, and jump into all kinds of adventures in the big world around them. Imagine hopping a ride on a furry dog or dodging raindrops bigger than your house! Using their unique insect abilities, our tiny heroes find ways to help themselves and others out of sticky situations and record their stories in their bug diaries!

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Three unlikely bug buddies, Fly, Spider and Worm, fly, spin, and jump into all kinds of adventures in the big world around them. Imagine hopping a ride on a furry dog or dodging raindrops bigger than your house! Using their unique insect abilities, our tiny heroes find ways to help themselves and others out of sticky situations and record their stories in their bug diaries!

episodes.name: Canine Cruise
episodes.overview: When Mookie the dog knocks over the schoolhouse, Fly comes up with a daring plan to get him to stop.

episodes.name: House Spider
episodes.overview: Fly inadvertently finds herself at an amazingly wonderful place filled with flies - the city dump! She makes a friend that is just like her and they have lots of fly-friendly fun, but she soon misses Worm and Spider and comes to appreciate their differences.

episodes.name: Fly's Picnic Problem
episodes.overview: Fly accidentally flies into a tree, and though she isn't injured, she's so unnerved by the event that she becomes afraid to fly. Meanwhile, Spider and Worm decide they want to be great inventors.

episodes.name: Worm's New Digs
episodes.overview: Fly and Spider help their friend Worm try to search for the perfect underground space for his new bedroom.

episodes.name: Dump Of Dreams
episodes.overview: Fly inadvertently finds herself at an amazingly wonderful place filled with flies - the city dump! She makes a friend that is just like her and they have lots of fly-friendly fun, but she soon misses Worm and Spider and comes to appreciate their differences.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Three unlikely bug buddies, Fly, Spider and Worm, fly, spin, and jump into all kinds of adventures in the big world around them. Imagine hopping a ride on a furry dog or dodging raindrops bigger than your house! Using their unique insect abilities, our tiny heroes find ways to help themselves and others out of sticky situations and record their stories in their bug diaries!

episodes.name: FLY GIRL TO THE RESCUE!
episodes.overview: Fly pretends to be her superhero alter-ego - Fly Girl - and goes on a mission to rescue a Dung Beetle's run away home and newborn larvae. It's too big of a job for one super bug so she joins with her friends to form a superhero team to save the day.

episodes.name: THE GREAT SPIDERO
episodes.overview: When Spider won't stop doing magic tricks in class, his teacher Mrs. Mulch has him stay after school. But instead of being punished, Mrs. Mulch takes him on a fieldtrip and shows him the magic of nature.

episodes.name: A NIGHTCRAWLER TO REMEMBER
episodes.overview: When Lucas captures Worm, Mama Worm and a few other bugs, Fly, Spider and Firefly launch a rescue mission into the house to save their friends.

episodes.name: SPIDER'S TIRE TROUBLE
episodes.overview: Lucas puts a tire swing on the Bug Tree, disrupting the lives of all the bugs who live there.

episodes.name: FLY BABY BLUES
episodes.overview: Fly, Worm and Spider succeed in permanently de-activating a motion-detection light that's been installed on the human house next door. In the process, Fly learns that it's not so bad being part of a big family.

episodes.name: WORM, PLAY BALL!
episodes.overview: On the day of their big tee-ball game, Worm, Fly and Spider find themselves unexpectedly caught in a big storm, and try to seek shelter from it.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Three unlikely bug buddies, Fly, Spider and Worm, fly, spin, and jump into all kinds of adventures in the big world around them. Imagine hopping a ride on a furry dog or dodging raindrops bigger than your house! Using their unique insect abilities, our tiny heroes find ways to help themselves and others out of sticky situations and record their stories in their bug diaries!
